Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: Alright, I need to put these quarters in the bank vault.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: Unfortunately, I will need your guys' help with this as well.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: We did just get a new security system for the vault.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: I don't know how to unlock it.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: All of these buttons and numbers are too tricky to figure out.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: So I'm gonna need you guys to figure out how to put in this code.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: The default code for the machine is:

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: The Red Button will reset the numbers back to 0. The Green Button will enter the code.

Items.name: Bank Guy
Items.text: Okay! I'll leave you guys to it!
